title: Software Engineer
description:
**Number of Job Posts** 
 : 12
 



  





**Company Description** 




  





 Seceon Inc. provides a next\\-generation AI\\-powered cybersecurity platform designed for enterprises, MSPs, and MSSPs to detect, respond to, and mitigate threats in real\\-time, eliminating the need for multiple security tools. The platform unifies SIEM, SOAR, UEBA, EDR, NDR, Threat Intelligence, Vulnerability Management, and Compliance features into one seamless solution. Seceon's cutting\\-edge technology leverages machine learning, artificial intelligence, and dynamic threat models to ensure rapid threat identification and automated remediation. Scalable and multi\\-tenant, the platform supports millions of events per second, offering comprehensive visibility and streamlined compliance with industry regulations. Trusted by organizations seeking faster threat resolutions, increased efficiency, and reduced cybersecurity costs.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time remote role for a Software Engineer. The Software Engineer will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and deploying high\\-quality software solutions. Day\\-to\\-day tasks include back\\-end development, implementing efficient programming solutions, and working with teams to ensure high\\-performance system functionality. The role will focus on creating scalable, secure, and reliable software to support cutting\\-edge cybersecurity technologies.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Strong foundation in Computer Science principles
* Proficiency in Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development
* Expertise in Programming and experience in Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP)
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and remotely
* Strong problem\\-solving skills with attention to detail and a drive to deliver innovative solutions
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related technical field
* Experience in the cybersecurity or technology industry is a plus
* Familiarity with AI and machine learning concepts is a bonus



  





 Visit: https://seceon.com/careers/

title: Python Backend & AI/ML Intern
description:
**Company Description** 




 Morpho Technologies is a cutting\\-edge generative AI startup dedicated to creating innovative products for both B2B and B2C markets, leveraging the power of artificial intelligence. Our flagship product, Storybit.tech, is an AI\\-enabled platform designed to support content creators in streamlining and enhancing every stage of their content production process. Our mission is to revolutionize the way businesses and individuals generate content using state\\-of\\-the\\-art technology. At Morpho Technologies, innovation and efficiency are at the heart of everything we do.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time, on\\-site internship role for a Python Backend \\& AI/ML Intern based. The intern will contribute to the development and optimization of backend systems, assist in creating and deploying AI wrapped product powered by AI, and collaborate with the team to support the integration of AI\\-driven solutions. Additional tasks may include debugging and maintaining code, analyzing data, and enhancing system performance in alignment with company goals.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Proficiency in Python programming and experience with backend development.
* Knowledge of AI/ML techniques, frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch), and algorithms.
* Understanding of APIs, RESTful services, and database management systems.
* Experience in data preprocessing, feature engineering, and deploying machine learning models.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and ability to work collaboratively within a team.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms and distributed systems is advantageous.
* Pursuing or holding a degree in Computer Science, Data Science, AI/ML, or a related field.



  





**Required Skills** 



* Academic background in
 **Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning**
* Hands\\-on experience with
 **PostgreSQL**
* Understanding of authentication mechanisms (JWT, OAuth, session\\-based auth)
* Experience with
 **Payment Gateway Integration** 
 (Razorpay, Stripe, etc.)
* Experience in API integration and third\\-party service integration
* Knowledge of deploying and integrating ML models into applications
* Understanding of e\\-commerce architecture is a plus
* Good problem\\-solving and logical thinking ability



  





**Internship Details** 




**Duration:** 
 3 Months
 



**Stipend:** 
 15K/Month
 



**Location:** 
 Remote/Hyderabad
 



**Type:** 
 Internship
 



**Full\\-Time Opportunity:** 
 Yes (Based on performance evaluation)

 We‚Äôre looking for an experienced
 **Python Software Engineer**

 Required skills on IT Industry as have experience in Python Django Developer, using of django framework.

 We are looking for a highly skilled
 **Senior Python Django Developer** 
 with extensive experience in building and scaling financial or payments\\-based applications. The ideal candidate has a deep understanding of system design, architecture patterns, and testing best practices, along with a strong grasp of the startup environment.
 



**Responsibilities:** 



* Design and develop scalable, secure, and high\\-performance applications using Python (Django framework.
* Ensure code quality through comprehensive unit testing, integration testing, and participation in code reviews.
* Collaborate closely with Product, DevOps, QA, and Frontend teams to build seamless end\\-to\\-end solutions.
* Drive performance improvements, monitor system health, and troubleshoot production issues.
* Apply domain knowledge in payments and finance, including transaction processing, reconciliation, settlements, wallets, UPI, etc.
* Strong background in payments/financial systems or FinTech applications.
* Proven experience in designing software architecture in a microservices or modular monolith environment.
* Proficiency in RESTful APIs, SQL (PostgreSQL/MySQL), NoSQL (MongoDB/Redis).
* Solid understanding of Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure).

 Workassist is an online recruitment and employment solution providing a platform in India. Our goal is to enhance the job seeking experience and provide the best opportunities for job seekers and the best talent for employers from all over the world.

title: Lead Telecom QA Automation Specialist (OSS)
description:
MANDATORY \\- Telecom OSS Network Inventory QA Experience
   

  

  

 NO FRESHER WILL BE PREFERRED
   

  

 HIRING
   

  

 We are hiring for Lead Telecom QA Automation Specialist (OSS) as a Full Time Contractual for IT Company
   

  

 Location\\- Hyderabad
   

 Experience \\- 8\\+ years
   

 Budget \\- As per market standards
   

 Notice Period \\- Immediate Joiner
   

  

 Role Overview
   

 We are looking for a QA Automation Engineer with strong experience in OSS (Operations Support Systems) and Network Inventory to ensure the quality, reliability, and performance of telecom/networking applications. The role focuses on building and executing automation frameworks, validating OSS workflows, and ensuring data accuracy across network inventory systems.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

 Design, develop, and maintain automation test frameworks for OSS and Network Inventory applications.
   

 Perform functional, regression, integration, and system testing using automation and manual approaches.
   

 Validate network inventory data models, topology, configurations, and lifecycle workflows.
   

 Test OSS components such as provisioning, activation, assurance, fault, and performance management.
   

 Develop and execute automated test scripts for API, UI, and backend/database testing.
   

 Ensure data integrity across inventory systems (logical \\& physical inventory).
   

 Collaborate with developers, architects, and product owners to understand requirements and define test strategies.
   

 Identify, log, track, and retest defects; ensure timely closure.
   

 Support CI/CD pipelines by integrating automation tests into build and deployment processes.
   

 Prepare test plans, test cases, automation reports, and quality metrics.
   

  

 Mandatory Skills
   

 Strong experience in QA Automation (minimum 4‚Äì8 years, depending on level).
   

 Hands\\-on experience with OSS systems in telecom or networking domains.
   

 Solid understanding of Network Inventory concepts (logical/physical inventory, topology, resources, services).
   

 Experience with automation tools/frameworks such as Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, or similar.
   

 Strong API testing experience (REST, SOAP) using tools like Postman, RestAssured, or similar.
   

 Good knowledge of SQL and database validation.
   

 Experience with test management and defect tracking tools (JIRA, ALM, Zephyr, etc.).
   

  

 Good\\-to\\-Have Skills
   

 Experience with Python / Java / JavaScript for automation scripting.
   

 Exposure to CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Azure DevOps).
